SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.reports

Class ReportHelper.CurrencyRequired

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reports.ReportHelper.CurrencyRequired
Enclosing class:
ReportHelper
public static class ReportHelper.CurrencyRequired extends Object
Manages currency conversion requirements for multi-currency price data analysis. Coordinates the identification of target currency and required conversion pairs, enabling sophisticated automatic currency normalization across diverse portfolios.

This class implements the intelligence for selecting optimal target currencies based on availability and managing the relationships between different currency pairs needed for comprehensive multi-currency analysis.

  • Field Details

    • adjustCurrency

      public String adjustCurrency
      The target currency (ISO 4217) selected for normalization. Automatically chosen based on currency pair availability and frequency of use in the analysis set.

    • carList

      public final List<ReportHelper.CurrencyAvailableRequired> carList
      List of all currency conversion requirements needed for the analysis. Includes both existing currency pairs and those that need to be created.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • containsCurrencypairIgnoreFromTo

      public Optional<ReportHelper.CurrencyAvailableRequired> containsCurrencypairIgnoreFromTo(String c1, String c2)
      Searches for an existing currency pair requirement regardless of conversion direction. Supports bidirectional currency pair matching (e.g., EUR/USD matches USD/EUR).
      Parameters:
      c1 - first currency code to search for
      c2 - second currency code to search for
      Returns:
      optional containing the matching currency pair requirement if found
